channel.title: BeyondRSC
channel.description:
Included is the full BeyondRSC client and server source, with everything it had (minus the stability with lots of players in an area)
Featured some custom stuff, server type is a PK/funserver (similar to stork point system, but with exp redistribution not points)
Images of server are located: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,421722.0.html
credits to Pyru for doing some of the graphic work Download here: http://uppit.com/v/C5ASCP33
enjoy

item.title: BeyondRSC
item.dc:creator: @Kozy Kozy
item.description:
@Kozy wrote:

[quote=“MubbY-Donskiie, post:41, topic:333966”][quote author=Kozy link=topic=430366.msg3161287#msg3161287 date=1269565003]

You should release 1 without the item comp shit. Or list everything that needs to be deleted to remove item comp…

(I’m not a coder and I have no plans on making a easy rsc server.this is just for the people)

Then why would it matter if you’re not a coder… whoever is going to be “running” this server should have some idea of know how to take out item composition, its alot of work though.

Lol, quit trying to call me out. I have no intentions in making a server. I’m just posting for the 100’s of leechers who already use easy rsc. hence: EASY rsc.

Not trying to insult you but this source is no longer EasyRSC, its beyond rsc, a highly modified version of easy-rsc.

The base source is still EasyRSC.

I stated that it was a highly modified version of easy-rsc?

It’s fucking runescappe. Nobody gives a shit. (atleast, anyone who isn’t gay?)
[/quote]
Lol kozy, you’re probably funny 3/10 times.[/quote]

I have been called funne before, now that you mention it.

(Better then being gay 3/10 times, likes YOU, xD)

Read full topic

item.title: BeyondRSC
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:38, topic:333966”]@Yong: uh telegrab bubble when dropping? maybe i must have been working on the client doing shit before i released it, i never really did test it out.

I forgot i never removed item composition, that system is 100% working (to remove, uh check the use item on item class, down the bottom is where u can remove the code to stop composing items) and then throw in a regular Items.rscd / ItemDef.xml into client and server, that should fix it.[/quote]

I didn’t try it with any regular items with the ID 0 - 1289. It seemed to be happening with some of the higher ID numbers, like 8000+

Yeah, the item composing isn’t hard to remove

Read full topic
